vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a permanent water pipeline easement and right-of-way including temporary working space easement from Oncor Electric Delivery Company, LLC, containing a total of approximately 433,446 square feet of land located near the intersection of South Clark Road and Oak Ridge Drive for the Southwest 120/96-inch Water Transmission Pipeline Project (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $575,000.00 ($561,478.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $13,522.00) - Financing: Water Capital Improvement F Fund
